summary: The diff adds UI and client-side logic to display an admin-only deployment readiness banner/section (checking access control initialization and Stripe configuration, with recommendations including CAFFEINE_ADMIN_TOKEN and navigation to Admin Dashboard). However, the BuildRequestâ€™s core Step 6 requirements about actually deploying the post-migration build to the network and confirming deployment/URL/runtime readiness are not implemented in code changes (and cannot be verified from the diff). The diff also includes multiple unrelated product features (HRMS employee management, wallets route, ecommerce/cart/checkout changes, Stripe setup modal, etc.) that go beyond deployment readiness verification.

missing_requirements.requirement: Deploy the post-migration build to the network and confirm deployment completes successfully without deployment errors.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff only shows code/UI/documentation changes; there is no evidence of deployment execution, CI/CD scripts, deployment commands, or recorded deployment results.

missing_requirements.requirement: Confirm the deployed application is accessible at the deployment URL and loads without runtime errors.
missing_requirements.reason: No evidence in the diff of runtime verification, smoke tests, monitoring checks, or documented deployment URL/accessibility confirmation.

missing_requirements.requirement: All readiness checks are confirmed as passing before proceeding to Step 7 (Publish Live).
missing_requirements.reason: The diff adds readiness UI, but does not show any gating mechanism, enforcement, or recorded confirmation that checks are passing; the checklist doc still marks Step 6 as PENDING in the provided snippet.

hallucinated_features.description: HRMS Employee Management CRUD UI (employees/departments, dialogs, status badges, add/edit/delete flows).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by Step 6 deployment readiness verification; explicitly outside the deployment-readiness scope.

hallucinated_features.description: Ecommerce cart/checkout enhancements including ICP wallet payment flow and Stripe checkout session navigation.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by Step 6 readiness checks; introduces/changes shopping and payment UX beyond readiness verification.

hallucinated_features.description: New /wallets route and wallet-related navigation/UI (Wallet Overview / Wallets button).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; unrelated to deployment readiness verification.

hallucinated_features.description: StripeSetupModal (admin-only modal for configuring Stripe with secret key and allowed countries, auto-shown when not configured).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only requires verifying Stripe configuration status and ability to navigate to admin dashboard to complete setup; implementing a new setup modal is beyond that scope.

hallucinated_features.description: Broad additions/changes to numerous React Query hooks including CRM/HRMS dashboard hooks (useGetPipelineDashboard, useGetPendingLeaves, useApproveLeave, useRejectLeave) and extensive mock implementations.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested for Step 6; introduces unrelated application functionality.

hallucinated_features.description: Backend main.mo expanded with many ERP/ecommerce/CRM/HRMS domain types (Organization/Product/Order/Employee/etc.).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested for Step 6 deployment readiness verification; appears to add unrelated domain model code.
